content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I am glad you find the apartment to your liking. Let's negotiate the price now.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am aware that the apartment is in the city center and is unfurnished with a size of 50 square meters. I think a reasonable price would be 600 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Let's not forget that the apartment is in the city center and close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given your preference for a higher price, I am willing to offer 650 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I find your offer still too low considering the location and facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering your previous comments, I am willing to offer 700 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am still looking for a higher price. The apartment's location and facilities are quite advantageous.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. Here's my final offer: 750 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [750] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time and effort in negotiating the price. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
